history.proof: hauto use: union_pl_r_1, union_pl_r_0 inv: term_list.

original: intros d pl0 pl1 tl Hcompat Hliste. induction tl using liste_reconnait_ind. - destruct Hcompat as [[Hpl0 Hpl1] | [Hpl0 Hpl1]]. -- left. apply rec_empty. -- apply union_pl_r_1 in Hliste. destruct Hliste; [left | right]; auto. - destruct Hcompat as [[Hpl0 Hpl1] | [Hpl0 Hpl1]]. -- destruct (Hliste pl0 pl1); [left | right]; auto. -- apply union_pl_r_0 in Hliste. destruct Hliste; [left | right]; auto.
